noun.description: A person who is hostile or indifferent to culture and the arts, or who has no understanding of them.
examples: I am a complete philistine when it comes to paintings

adjective.description: Hostile or indifferent to culture and the arts.
examples: there were displays to inspire even the most philistine of visitors

origin: Old English: from late Latin Philistinus from Greek Philistinos, from Hebrew pĕlištī: compare with Palestine. See also philistine.
